inn1.comm: lovely length ball first up, lands on a sweet spot and shaves past Tharanga's backfoot defense
first runs for Sri Lanka, as bowler lands one outside leg stump for a wide
short of a length, pitches on middle and off and moves past Tharanga again, with some good juicy bounce this time, 'keeper collects
back of a length on middle and leg this time, comes into Tharanga, who shuffles and defends to leg
short of a length and moving away from off stump, Tharanga has a feel for it and then moves the bat back, good stuff from Mortaza
good ball again, length delivery on the stumps, a tentative Tharanga dabs that into the off side and scampers a quick single, good call from Jayasuriya too
oversteps, the ball lands outside leg and batsman tries to flick to leg, but doesnt get bat on it and has to settle for a leg-bye in front of short fine leg
good lateral movement on this one, which pitches on a short length outside off stump and swings away a fair bit
back of a length outside off stump, some swing for him first up, batsman pushes that into the covers
good length ball on middle and leg, Jayasuriya defends to midwicket and thinks about the single, but resists as the fielder swoops in
good ball, beaten! Rasel lands it on a good length and gets it to swing away as Jayasuriya lunges forward in defence, and the ball beats the bat

short of a length outside off stump, and at that minimal pace its easy for Jayasuriya to roll the wrists over it and pull through square leg for the first four of the match, and the fielder giving chase slips on the ropes as he tries to stop it
fraction width on offer, but not enough to cut, Jayasuriya goes through with it and the ball almost rolls onto off stump, and he has to use the bat to push the ball away
length ball on off stump, no movement, Jayasuriya gets well behind it and defends back to the bowler
back of a length on leg stump, turned right to square leg
back of a length with more pace on it, pitches outside off stump and moves away a good deal, as Tharanga shoulders arms to it
good length and moving away from outside off stump, he plants the front leg forward and shoulders arms again
shorter ball on leg stump, Tharanga hops up and rolls the wrists over it to pick up a single to the left of square leg
a tad fuller this time, Jayasuriya gets forward quickly and defends it to point
pitches outside leg stump and Jayasuriya tries to turn it fine, but doesnt get bat on it so he settles for leg-byes as square leg gives chase and hauls it in near the fine leg ropes

back of a length outside off stump, no room to cut at all, Tharanga stands up on the toes and goes for a cheeky dab to point, and the ball so nearly rolls onto off stump via the inside edge, and Jayasuriya calls for a very risky single and makes it in the end
good length and moving in from outside off stump, Jayasuriya tentatively comes forward and pokes at it, the ball scoots past backward point and the batsmen run very well for a couple
back of a length around off stump, Jayasuriya gets right behind the ball and defends back to Rasel, who gives him a little look, nice to see the competition
bang, thats maximum! Rasel pitches full outside leg stump, just where Jayasuriya loves 'em, and the ball sails over backward square leg for half a dozen
good comeback, a length ball outside off stump, he comes forward and defends

madness! A good length ball moves in some from off stump, Jayasuriya defends to leg, Tharanga sets off at some pace and is sent back about half-way down the track and looks a goner, but Rasel, who picks the ball up and has all the time in the world to hit the nonstriker's stumps, fires in a throw that misses the stumps, wow that would have been out if he'd hit...where's the back-up fielder?
good ball, lands on a back of a length and moves away very well from the left-hander, who just stands and defends and gets beaten by the lateral movement
good length ball outside off stump, Tharanga gets the front leg out and then shoulders arms
good length, moves in a bit from leg stump and Tharanga has to lunge forward and defend back to Mortaza, who watches it roll past him to mid-on
some width on offer, he gest up and uppercuts through the vacant gulley down to third man for one
short again, he gets up and runs that wide of backward point for a couple out to the man on the move from third man
back of a length around off stump, Tharanga stands tall and defends back towards Mortaza, a dot ball to end the over

short of a length outside off stump, he just opens the face of the bat and runs it past point and runs three, good work by the man on the ropes, who dives and saves the extra run, Aftab Ahmed was the man
poor ball, very full and wide outside leg stump, easy as they come for Tharanga, who helps it on its way down to the fine leg ropes
good length ball outside off stump, moves in but he's well outside off stump, as is  the impact
good length outside off stump, pushed into the covers for one
good length ball outside off stump, Jayasuriya reaches forward and pushes to Razzak at cover, he wants the single but Tharanga doesnt
good ball to end the over, a good length just outside off stump, and Jayasuriya gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
a fraction short outside off stump and he just crunches that between point and cover for four, got right over it in a flash and spanked it away
fuller outside off stump, he drives and gets an inside-edge through square leg for a brace
he oversteps, the ball is fuller outside off stump and batsman defends uneasily
good length ball lands marginally outside leg and squares him up, the ball clips the pad and rolls to point, was missing leg stump
short of a length outside leg stump, turned wide of short fine leg for one
good length ball moves away from just outside off stump, Jayasuriya covers his stumps and shoulders arms
a tad fuller on the stumps, he comes forward and turns it to square leg, no chance of a run this time
short and wide, cut down to third man for one
good length ball on off stump, he comes forward in defense
short of a length outside off stump, he latches onto it and pulls through short fine leg for four, good, aggressive shot
sits up from outside off stump, he gets over it and chops it to cover
back of a length and moving down leg, he flicks it nicely to midwicket for an easy single
good length ball on the stumps, he comes forward and defends
good length, quick ball on off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward and defends, gets an inside-edge to the off stump and responds well to Tharanga's call for the quick single
drifts down leg stump and he turns it to square leg for one
fraction wide and he chops it past gulley for a couple, nicely rolled the wrists over it
shot, another short of a length ball and he drops the hands on it nicely, running it between gulley and point for four, used the pace of the ball
width again for him, but this time he cuts right to the man at point
back of a length ball moves in from leg stump, Jayasuriya shuffles and defends to the on side and yells out a firm 'NO' to Tharanga as Mortaza moves in
good length ball swings into him, he turns it fine, not that convincingly, through square leg for a couple out to the man in the deep
good length ball outside off stump, he gets forward and defends to Razzak at cover
overpitched on the legs and he clips it past short fine leg for a single out to Mortaza on the ropes
cardinal sin of overpitching on the pads, and he has to watch the ball sail handsomely over midwicket sweeper for six
good length ball on and around off stump, he comes forward and defends

this one moves in sharply from outside off stump and catches Jayasuriya by surprise, Rasel lets out a loud appeal but the umpire isnt interested, the ball probably did too much and looked to be going over the stumps
tossed up outside off stump, enough width for him to rock back and bisect the off side field for four, good shot
tossed up again, he comes forward and defends and gets beaten
quicker one, spins in sharply and he runs it to short fine leg for one
flatter outside off stump, he jabs the bat down and runs it gulley
quicker one just outside off stump, he works it to square leg for a quick single, well run
tossed up outside off stump and it spins sharply past him as he looks to run it fine, the 'keeper doesnt take it cleanly
back of a length outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets back and punches it to the packed off side field, no chance of a run
down the leg side and wide signalled, Jayasuriya tried to tickle it fine but missed out on a freebie
good ball! Jayasuriya was cramped for room and almost dragged onto off stump
dragged in short just outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets onto it and pulls over midwicket, and thats four
good ball! Sits up from a good length and surprises him, he pokes at it and the genuine edge bobs up past the vacant slip region and runs down to third man
another good length ball sits up quickly and catches Tharanga by surprise, he does well to get up and keep it down to the off side
great ball! Lands short of a length and moves off the seam to comprehensively beat Tharanga's backfoot prod, a nice offcutter at some pace
tossed up outside off stump, defened to the off side
now he gives him the charge, getting well enough to the pitch of it and hammering it way over long-off for another six!
quicker one now, he uses the feet and drives to midwicket
flatter outside off stump, he plants the leg out and pads it away
thats his 50! Jayasuriya again advances out of his crease to a very wide ball, doesnt get to the pitch at all but has enough power on it to send it over long-off for another six, well played sir
quicker and flatter on middle and leg, turned to the onside for a quick single, and he will keep strike
dragged in short outside leg stump, Jayasuriya swivels and pulls that just over the hands of a jumping square leg, and thats four more to his name
another short ball outside leg stump, he stands up and dabs it past the diving 'keeper for runs down to fine leg
good length ball on off stump, pushed to point and sends back his partner who's keen on the run, wise call from Jayasuriya
good length ball on and around off stump, he comes forward and defends to cover
fraction wide outside off stump, he confidently dabs that wide of gulley and calls for the two from the word go
back of a length on leg stump, worked to the left of square leg and they jog through for the single
dropped in short very first ball, pulled away through square leg for one out to the sweeper

superb catch by Aftab at backward point! Rafique drops in a rank short ball outside off stump, Tharanga punches off the back foot but fails to keep it down, and Aftab times his jump to perfection, plucking it in the air with his right hand, losing control, but then bobbing it up and taking in cleanly as he falls to the ground
tossed up, he comes forward and defends
tossed up, lands on and around off stump and spins away, Jayawardene defends
this one's flatter and shorter, and he pulls through square leg to open up his account
fired in quicker down leg stump, thats a wide one, and the batsmen steal a run too, Rafique getting the faster one all wrong

good ball, tossed up teasingly outside off stump, good rotation through the air, drawing Jayawardene into a drive, picking up the outside edge but there's no slip in place and the ball escapes for a run
length ball sliding down leg stump, he tries to flick but ends up with a leg-bye off the pads
racing down leg stump and he tickles it fine down to fine leg for four, the man was up so he cashed in well, Jayasuriya
back of a length ball outside leg stump, he tries to dab it fine again but gets a leg-bye to square leg
good length delivery just outside off stump, Jayawardene gets behind it and defends back to Mortaza
short of a length, rising delivery outside off stump, to which he shoulders arms
this one moves in off a length and forces Jayawardene to quickly get over it and turn it to an alert midwicket, no run there
fired in on leg stump, he uses the feet and drives, not timed well and the ball rolls to short fine leg
quicker and flatter, he rocks back and pulls uncomfortably, Bashar dives at square leg and cuts off runs
tossed up, he comes forward and defends, turning the hands over it for two past square leg
tossed up nicely, he comes forward and defends
invitingly tossed up again, and he gets forward and drops the hands on it
this one's wider, he waits on it and then runs it to gulley
fired up outside off stump, spins in and catches Jayasuriya lunging forward, they all go up but he's gotten well forward and outside the line
quicker one again, Jayasuriya uses the feet and Razzak holds the ball back, forcing him to defend it
dragged in shorter now, and its pulled through midwicket for two out to the sweeper
tossed up, he comes forward and drives towards mid-on, the bowler gets across and fields
tossed up, he comes down and lofts it between mid-on and mid-wicket out to the sweeper
tossed up, Jayawardene thinks about pulling it away but has to adjust to turn it to square leg
flatter one on leg stump, Jayasuriya plays it late, working it to square leg for one
tossed up, Jayawardene tentatively plays at it, away from his body, to dab it to backward point
uses the feet this time, working one from off stump to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, he shimmies down the track and lofts it between mid-on and midwicket out to the man on the ropes
looped up on off stump, defended back to Rafique
tossed up again, and Jayawardene just comes half forward in defense

dragged in quick and short, Jayasuriya swings it away over square leg, the ball looks to be going for six but Ashraful down there jumps up, takes the catch, and smartly throws it back in as he falls over the ropes, neatly done by him
quicker one just outside off stump, Jayawardene defends to point
turn! Pitches just outside off stump and spins past Jayawardene's forward defense, good ball

quicker one, turned to square leg, he sets off and gets sent back, the 'keeper Rahim moves quickly, collects it, Jayawardene is some seven miles down the track...all he had to do was run in and flick the bails off, but instead he has a shy at the stumps and misses...oh ho!
tossed up on middle and leg, and he sweeps it fine for four...the bowler wont like that at all
tossed up, he comes forward and defends back to Razzak
quicker and flatter, Jayasuriya works it from outside off stump to square leg for one
spins down leg stump, and he eases it to short fine leg for one
tossed up, spins into him and he works it off the hips to square leg, calling for the quick single
tossed up on off stump, Jayawardene gets forward and turns it to the onside, 'keeper moves and collects
tossed up outside off stump, gets forward and drives to cover

fired in down leg stump, now he sweeps, the ball goes to Aftab at short fine leg, Jayawardene sets off and has to hurry and turn back to his crease, and had the throw been better, he would've struggled...nope, he was definitely a goner, but Rahim's flick back to the stumps was off
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and taps it back to the bowler
quicker down leg stump, easy for him to turn it fine for one
quicker through the air, pitching on off stump, Jayawardene turns it to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, Jayawardene stretches a long way forward and sweeps to square leg for the single
quicker one on middle and leg, worked right to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets over it and pushes wide of point for one to retain strike
quicker one slipping down leg stump, worked to the onside for one
the arm ball goes awry as it lands outside leg stump for a wide
flatter one, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up down leg, paddled wide towards Aftab at short fine leg for a quick single
tossed up this time, quicker, he comes forward and defends
quick again but he's feeding him with width to cut past backward point for two
slower, tossed up outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets well forward and pushes to point for one
quicker one through the air, pitches outside off stump and beats Jayasuriya's cut
tossed up, pushed down to mid-off
good length ball, tossed up on off stump, pushed back to the left of the bowler
quicker one outside off stump, too full but, and its swept from a length through square leg, past the umpire, for one
tossed up, he waits for it and then at the nth minute pushes to backward point
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts past backward point for the single, and the rains picking up here...not a good sign
quick and flat outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts hard just wide of Razzak at backward point and wants one, but gets sent back
tossed up on off stump, he drives to midwicket
short and wide, he reaches out for it and slaps it to backward point
tossed up outside leg stump, swept to short fine leg
flatter trajectory, defended back to the left of Rafique
tossed up wide of off stump, he waits on it and then late-cuts down to third man, a single for his efforts
tossed up outside off stump, he stands and cuts towards backward point
tossed up on off stump, he turns that, in the air, towards midwicket but the ball dies well before the fielder
tossed up again, and once more he turns that loosely to the onside
flatter ball outside off stump, he stands up and drives past mid-on for one to get off the mark
tossed up on middle and leg, turned fine for one, the 'keeper does the collecting
short and wide, he pulls from where it pitches out to midwicket
looped up, full, he uses the feet to drive to cover for one
tossed up on the stumps, he shuffles and works it off the hips wide of square leg, they set off and a sharp throw from Razzak forces them to go upstairs, but replays show he was just in
full and flat on off stump, nicely worked to square leg for one
tossed up outside off stump, Jayawardene stretches the leg out and sweeps, in the air, over backward square leg and the ball falls just short of Rasel running in
pitches on leg stump and spins down sharply, wide not called
flatter one, he drives off the backfoot back to Rafique
tossed up on a length, he gets forward and then plays it late, defending to point

hello, where did that come from! Jayawardene wakes up from a sluggish period, getting the front foot out and lofting a tossed up delivery from outside off stump over cow corner for six, a nice, clean strike that!
slower one outside off stump, and normalcy is restored as he comes half forward and defends
a fraction shorter and he gets back and works it through square leg this time
tossed up, Sangakkara gets well forward and drives past mid-off for one out to the deep
flatter one this time, he shuffles across and then works it to midwicket for one
quick and flat, he gets over it and turns it to the onside, no chance of a run but

dropped! Tossed up on a length, Jayawardene uses the feet and drives in the air to cover, where Bashar times his jump well, gets a hand to it, loses it, then parries it back, and ends up dropping it! Just couldnt hang on to the rebound!
tossed up, swept hard to square leg, the fielder has a shy and its wayward, allowing a second run to Jayawardene
tossed up on leg, goes for a flick but misses
tossed up, driven through midwicket for a couple
quicker one, beats his tame attempt at a late cut
tossed up on the legs, nudged gently to square leg
flatter through the air outside off stump, Jayawardene mistimes the drive, chopping into the ground
slower one outside off stump, stays low as he covers off stump and leaves it alone

quicker ball, lands just outside off stump, inviting the cut, which he goes for and there's a noise, with the 'keeper collecting and appealing vociferously, but the umpire shakes his head...there was some deviation, glove perhaps...Jayawardene looks lucky to survive
tossed up, defended to the off side
short of a length, he mistimes the cut shot to the covers
flatter trajectory on off stump, he goes back and drives past mid-on for a well-run double
quicker through the air, he comes onto the front foot and turns it into midwicket, and they get the run even though the fielder was sharp
width on offer, he waits for it and cuts towards point for one
tossed up on the stumps, Sangakkara uses the feet and drives to mid-on for one
half a dozen! Flat outside off stump, he clears the front leg and slog-sweeps that superbly over deep midwicket, many rows back into the stands, a huge hit
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and turns it to short fine leg, where a rank misfield - I'm talking straight through the legs - gives up four runs, poor stuff, really
tossed up on leg stump, Sangakkara works it through square leg with few hassles
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts it into the point region for a single, a diving stop by Ashraful took some pace off that shot
flatter on middle and leg, Sangakkara goes back and works it through midwicket, and knows he can get two all the time, and goes for the first run very, very hard
slower one, he goes for a dab and inside-edges back into the ground
down leg stump, wide not called
short and flat, he rocks back and pulls to midwicket for one
slipping down leg side, Sangakkara shapes to pull, misses and it rollsoff the pad towards short fine leg
sharp turn there. Landed on the off stump line and broke away, Jayawardene waits for the turn, stretches his bat out like a pole, runs it to short third man
on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
gets a single with a drive to mid-on
quicker, flatter, on the off stump line, turns away a touch, nudged to the off side.
Flighted delivery on the off stump line, Sanga eases back, punches it through the line, to deep cover. Brilliantly placed.
rotates the strike with a drive to mid-on
slightly short in length, pulled to deep midwicket
shout for lbw. Sangakkara goes for a sweep and is rapped on the pad but the point of impact was outside off stump
on the middle stump line, pushed straight to midwicket
beats that man this time and pings the long-on fielder
short in length, landed on the off stump line, turned down leg side. Sangakkara tried to pull it but doesn't get a touch and also, importantly, neither does the 'keeper. 4 wides!
on the middle and leg, dabbed past square-leg for a single
Jayawardene charges out, it is pushed outside off stump and he reaches for it and drives to widish long-off
leans forward, turns a fullish delivery through midwicket for a single
on the off and middle stump line, turns in slightly, punched back to the bowler
Fab shot to bring up 200. Tossed up, outside off and Sangakkara swept it in front of square. Past the deep midwicket fielder.
leans forward, pushes a flatish delivery back to the bowler.
quick and flat outside off stump, he comes forward and turns it in the gap at midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he leans and sweeps through square leg out to the sweeper
and he's gone! Jayawardene skips down the ground, gets under it and checks his shot, spooning it high in the air and down to Aftab moving in from wide long-off
flat on off stump, he goes back and punches to mid-on
tossed up on a length outside off stump, Silva comes forward and defends to point
tossed up fuller, he gets well forward and kills any spin the bowler was striving for
good length outside off stump, Sangakkara gets to the pitch and drives down towards long-off for one
fuller one on the stumps, he gets forward and almost falls over as he drives back to Rasel
good length delivery just outside off stump, Silva gets onto the frontfoot and defends to the off side, not interesting in running
good length on the stumps, Silva can only defend it back to Rasel
back of a length just moving past off stump, he plays it with soft hands to backward point
another good delivery, upto the batsman, who gets bat and pad together and defends
flat outside off stump, he goes back and drives to midwicket, where Bashar dives and fields
tossed up, defended back to the bowler
goes short and flat again, and Sangakkara works it wide of Bashar at midwicket for one
tossed up outside off stump, Silva goes back and punches into the covers for his first run
short and flat, Sangakkara stands tall and cuts square for one
quicker one, spins into him from off stump and he adjusts to flick fine
full delivery on the stumps, he drives back to Rasel
good length outside off stump, Sangakkara comes forward and drives into the covers, where Razzak dives and stops run, good effort
back of a length on the stumps, he goes back and drives to mid-on
fuller delivery on off stump, Silva uses the feet but can only drive back to Rasel
fraction wide of off stump, Silva cuts hard and late, using the length of the ball to place it in the gap at gulley and even Rafique at third man cant reach it
back of a length on the stumps, Silva plays it with soft hands, shuffling across, and picks up one just wide of Razzak at square leg
nice shot! Silva comes down the ground, getting to the length and just chipping it over extra cover and thats six!
short and wide, he cuts into the covers
tossed up on off stump, he rolls the wrists over it and flicks to midwicket
now he too uses the feet to dance down the track, and isnt though he isnt to the pitch, he goes through with the aerial drive and lucky for him, it lands safely in front of long-on
back of a length, he shuffles and drives straight to midwicket
huge! Sangakkara sees the ball going down leg stump, gets down on bended knee, and slams that high over deep midwicket for maximum
slower one, on a good length, and he comes forward and defends
good length but wider of off stump, Silva stands and tries to run it late, but is beaten by the extra carry, as is the 'keeper Rahim
good length right on the stumps, he comes forward and gets over it, defending back to Rasel
short of a length on the stumps, Silva rolls the wrists over it and pulls through square leg out to the man in the deep
good length outside off stump, Sangakkara drives loosely and picks up one past mid-on
overpitched outside off stump, he leans into it and drives to Tamim at cover
fired in full on leg stump, Sangakkara gets over it, flicking through midwicket for one
tossed up on off stump, Silva uses the feet and hits against the turn, a nice pick-up shot over midwicket, one bounce four
tossed up down leg stump, he flicks past short fine leg out to Nafees coming in from the ropes
tossed up, Sangakkara advances, looking to hit over extra cover, Rafique fires it wide and the result is a thick outside egde down to third man
quicker and flatter, pulled through square leg
flat and spinning down leg stump, Silva plays it off the hips out to deep backward square leg and keeps strike
good length delivery, landed just outside leg stump and hits the back leg, maybe high too, but a very good shout by all
overpitched outside off stump, he drives to Saqibul at point
gets outside leg stump as Rasel comes in to bowl, then comes back as he sees the ball is full, and works it past square leg for one
overpitched outside off stump, Sangakkara shuffles and drives, getting an inside-edge through midwicket, he runs hard and collects two
a low full toss on off stump is clipped through midwicket, where Bashar dives and misfields, and in the deep Tamim dives on the ropes and the umpire signals four
overpitched on off stump, he shuffles and flicks into midwicket
short and wide, he pulls out to Rasel on the deep midwicket ropes
tossed up outside off stump, Silva tries to paddle-sweep but doesnt make contact
nice shot, made room outside leg stump to free the arms, and slams this over extra cover, hard and flat, for a boundary to raise the 50-run stand
quicker one outside off stump, he slashes and gets an egde down to third man
short and flat, Sangakkara pulls into midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he gets forward and sweeps out to backward square leg for the single
fuller one on leg stump, Silva flicks to short fine leg
overpitched outside off stump, Silva gets down and sweeps through square leg out to the man on the ropes

dropped! By that man Bashar at midwicket again! Sangakkara pulls a rank low full toss from outside off stump, Bashar dives to his right and drops an easy catch, and the batsman scamper through for two runs...

this time he goes! Sangakkara comes forward and lofts the ball down to long-on, though he was looking to chip it over the infield, and Tamim takes a simple catch running forward...the drop from Bashar cost two runs
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to point
gives himself room to smash it over the off side, but mistimes the shot to cover instead
short of a length outside off stump, Silva cuts hard into the covers and responds to Jayasuriya's call for the run
tossed up outside off stump, Jayasuriya drives to Nafees in the covers, who stumbles as he collects it
beaten through the air by a much quicker one that turns and bounces
tossed up, Silva comes forward and flicks to midwicket for one
flatter outside off stump, Jayasuriya opts for some sort of reverse-sweep but fails to make contact, they all appeal but the impact was outside the line

fired in on leg stump, Jayasuriya picks it off the pads high and down to deep backward square leg, where the fielder on the ropes catches it, steps back over the boundary, parries it up but sees the ball also land over the ropes...Ashraful again
and Silva greets him with an inside-out smash over extra cover, off the toe end of the bat, for four
much fuller, Silva gets yards down the track and flicks into the midwicket region and calls for two, Jayasuriya is struggling but he makes it safely
full outside off stump, he gets onto one leg and flicks to midwicket for one to Nafees
full on leg stump, he bends down and flicks it superbly in the gap behind square for four, no one had a chance to stop that
dragged in short, he shuffles across the stumps in an attempt to pull, gets under it and doesnt time it all, the ball shoots up over short fine leg and lands in no man's land
full outside off stump, Silva looks to paddle it fine but ends up with a leg-bye to square leg
flat on off stump, he makes room and drives into the covers for one
shorter one, spins into him, he plays it late to gulley for one

dropped! Short and quick, he makes room to leg to cut it hard, mistimes it and gets an outside egde that bobs up back towards short third man, where Mortaza dives full length to his left but cant grab the chance
thats his hundred! Great innings! Jayasuriya lays into it, slamming it high over midwicket for maximum! What a player!
and again! This time Jayasuriya goes off side, stepping out and lofting one tossed up outside off stump back over long-off for six!

all over, tamely! Jayasuriya comes forward and reverse-sweeps a full delivery, but ends up scooping a catch to Bashar at short fine leg, who holds onto one this time...very, very good innings from the entertainer
back of a length delivery that gets some purchase fom the surface and beats the bat
full on the pads, flicked over fine leg for four, ala Mark Waugh
lands fuller this time outside off stump, a play and miss

shot man! Overpitched outside off stump, and now Silva does a replica Dhoni, getting the back leg up and flicking it superbly over deep backward square leg for maximum! What an innovative stroke from the young lad!
good length outside off stump, a simple tip-and-run to backward point
full down the pads, flicked down to fine leg for a single
flat on off stump, Arnold punches past mid-on for one
flat on the stumps, Silva backs away and cuts to cover for one
fired in quickly again, Arnold gets down on one knee in an attempt to sweep, and gets in inside-edge onto the back leg and they scamper one as the ball rolls to the off side
tossed up on leg stump, he looks to sweep but has to contend with a leg-bye
dot ball! Fired up full and outside off stump, Arnold heaves across the line and misses all ends up, they all look to the umpire for the wide, but he remains motionless
fraction short and wide, Arnold rocks back and cuts past point, wants two all the time, and just manages to get home in the end

inn2.comm: moving, back of a length delivery outside off stump which the batsman lets pass
good length outside off stump, he opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
good length, swinging delivery outside off stump, Nafees shuffles across and lets it pass for Sangakkara to collect
closer to off stump, again it pitches and deviates away from the left-hander, who shoulders arms

gone! As expected, Vaas works closer and closer to off stump, getting one to land just in line with the stumps, full and jagging back in, Nafees is caught deep in the crease, in front of off, and the umpire has little hesitation in giving that out!
and he gets a peach first up, that pitches full outside off stump and then curls in, and he sure seems to know where his off stump is, shouldering arms to that one
lovely! A quick, swinging yorker that swings in from middle and off and has Tamim falling over in defence, and he manages to dig it out to the leg side
full, moving delivery on the stumps, Rahim gets behind it and defends
back of a length on leg stump, Rahim tucks that to square leg
superb! Quick, moving, off a great length and Rahim is almost squared up as he feels for that one off the backfoot, and the ball climbs on Sangakkara behind the stumps
and again, Malinga beats him with one that kicks off a good length and Sangakkara has to take it over his head
back of a length on off stump, Rahim's right behind the line in defence, and getting off the mark with a tip-and-run in front of point
good shout! Lands on a good length, but pitched just outside leg stump, rapping Rahim on the front leg but those cant be given out
good length on the stumps, defended back to Vaas with ease
fractionally overpitched, and he gets forward and drives nicely to cover, but cant beat the men there
lovely movement, getting it to land full and sucking Rahim into a waft outside off stump
good length outside off stump, Rahim gets forward and pushes compactly to cover
back of a length on and around off stump, hurrying the batsman into his defense, a maiden over from Vaas
fullish delivery on middle and off, Tamim stands rooted and drives, and is saved by the inside-edge back onto the back leg
good length outside off stump, he gets over it and defends to Silva at point
overpitched outside off stump, and Tamim stands up and dispatches the half-volley nicely in the gap at cover for his first boundary, nice shot!

edged and gone! Malinga responds with a short of a length, moving delivery outside off stump that kicks off the surface, Tamim stands leaden-footed and fishes at it, and Sangakkara snaps up the regulation edge
back of a length delivery moves in from outside off stump, he hops up and taps that to the on side
good length delivery on off stump, Aftab gets across and keeps it down in front of him
good length delivery moving across the stumps, he gets in line and defends confidently to the off side...Vaas gives him a nice look
back of a length outswinger, moves across him and he shoulders arms to it
back of a length outside off stump, defended into the covers
good length cutter outside off stump, he looks to leave it but is slow, and the ball clips the bat and almost rolls onto the stumps
good length just on off stump, he gets across and defends it down into the ground...Vaas giving them nothing to work with
back of a length on middle and leg, Rahim shuffles and taps it to square leg
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover
short of a length outside off stump, Aftab stands in his crease and lofts that in the air over extra cover, Murali backpeddles but the balls too far ahead of him
rubbish ball, way down leg stump, wide called
good length ball smack on off stump, Aftab gets behind it and defends back to Malinga
bounces him with one that moves in from outside off stump and sails over Aftab's left shoulder
good one, rips off a short length and moves the other way as Aftab tries to get out of the way
drifts down leg stump, off a length, and Aftab tucks it to fine leg for one
aggression! Aftab, standing outside his crease, gives Vaas the charge and lifts one from off stump over midwicket for four, good stuff
the reply is a gem, pitching fuller and moving across him, drawing him into a false drive and getting beaten
shot! Vaas strays onto the pads and Aftab cashes in, flicking off the legs high over square leg for another four
beaten by another one that slants past off stump, his feet dont move as he chases the offcutter
good length outside off stump, he lunges forward to drive and gets a thick edge that scoots past the vacant gulley out to third man for a single
back of a length on the stumps, Rahim gets behind it and defends it down
back of a length on off stump, Aftab hops up and keeps it down to the off
now he gets a bit too enthusiastic, coming down the track and chasing a wide delivery, 91mph too, and getting beaten

gone! Malinga drops short, at a lively pace, Aftab takes his eyes off it as he has a go, pulling off the splice of the bat, the ball goes up in the air and comes down near square leg, two men converge on it, Jayasuriya says dont touch it, thats mine, keeps his eyes on it the entire time and dives forward to pluck it! Not bad for a 37-year-old, eh?
back of a length outside off stump, he gets behind it and defends to the off side
this one's headed down leg stump and rises after it pitches, he takes his eyes off it and manages to keep it down in front of short fine leg, well bowled
short-pitched delivery on middle and off, he leaves it be and it sails past him
back of a length delivery outside off stump, pitches and moves away, Rahim withdraws on the shot
good length, moving away from outside off stump, he shoulders arms and lets it pass
good length ball, movement off the pitch back into him, Rahim stands and defends to the off side
good length, inswing again for the bowler, Rahim stands and defends
back of a length outside off stump, he opens the face of the bat and steers it to point
quicker and a tad fuller outside off stump, Rahim shoulders arms to it
back of a length outside off stump, squares him up, he gets an edge to gulley
good ball! Lands it on a sweet spot outside off stump, the ball stands up and beats Rahim's backfoot prod
back of a length well outside off stump, no worries for Rahim, who lets it be
good length delivery outside off stump, a minimal amount of movement into Rahim, who plants the leg out and shoulders arms
good length outside off stump, asking him to drive, but Rahim opts for caution, letting that ball be
short of a length outside off stump, extra bounce, now Rahim flashes at it and gets a thick edge over the slips and away for four
good length outside off stump, Saqibul gets forward in defense
back of a length outside off stump, he gets back and punches nicely to cover
back of a length outside off stump, the movement squares him up, and he edges the ball along the ground to Dilshan at backward point
good length inswinger, does too much moving down leg, and the appeal for leg before is turned down by umpire Davis
back of a length delivery moves into him and he has to hustle to keep it out, defending back to Vaas off the back foot
back of a length, pitches outside off stump and moves away, but Saqibul negates it by getting behind the line and punching to the off side
and he's gone, freeing the arms and cutting a pretty poor, wide delivery hard to Dilshan at backward point, who moves to his left and holds the catch above his head!
good length outside off stump, he watches it go through to Sangakkara
fractionally overpitched outside off stump, Bashar leans into a drive to Silva at cover
fullish delivery outside off stump, he moves across and drives loosely to mid-on
good length delivery just outside off stump, he leaves it be
good length outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and defends to the covers
good length delivery outside off stump, he leans forward and drives and gets beaten by the movement
good length ball on leg stump, he shuffles and flicks to square leg
dropped! Short of a length delivery outside off stump, he stands and chases it, and Jayawardene drops a sharp chance diving to his left at slip, but thats one that should've been taken
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover
good length delivery pitches on leg stump and swings down, moving down the line of impact, Rahim comes across to flick and gets rapped, they all go up in appeal, but it looked to be swinging too much
back of a length outside off stump, he defends off the back foot
short of a length, cut off the back foot down to third man for one
back of a length on the stumps, he gets behind the line and defends
back of a length on leg stump, he has too hurry to keep it out to the off side
wide down the leg side, Saqibul tries to flick but misses
short of a length on off stump, he goes back and defends to the off side
good length outside off stump, the slower one, he defends to point off the back foot
back of a length on leg stump, Saqibul comes down the track but mistimes the drive to midwicket
spins sharply off a length into Bashar, who backs away and drives back to Murali
quicker one on off stump, again he goes back and pushes back to Murali
the doosra rips past the bat outside off stump!
quicker one spins down leg stump and is called wide, some viscious turn there
short and wide, staying low as Rahim goes for the cut and misses
spins in from off stump, he stands and defends
back of a length, he goes back and defends
length ball outside leg stump, a no-ball, flicked to square leg for one
good length ball outside off stump, he comes forward and defends to the onside with the inside-edge
short and wide, Bashar rocks back and cuts hard, Silva half-stops it at point and they settle for two
dragged in short outside off stump and Bashar latches onto it with a controlled pull shot through square leg for four, lovely placement and shot selection!
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and runs it to Dilshan at backward point
good length outside off stump, he isnt to the pitch and ends up driving in the air but luckily for him the ball lands in front of mid-off
back of a length outside off stump, dug out to point
tossed up outside off stump, Saqibul sweeps hard through midwicket but there are two men out there for this shot
spins in off a short length, Bashar rocks back and cuts but cant beat the off side field
fuller and flatter, he comes out to take it on the full and whips it to midwicket
the doosra pegs back leg stump! This one was ripped up, landing on middle and spinning in past a clueless, leaden-footed Saqibul to rerrange the furniture
tossed up on off stump, Ashraful comes forward and drives back to Murali
moves around the wicket and lets another doosra rip, pitches on middle and off and fizzes past his backfoot defence
back of a length outside off stump, Bashar's feet go nowhere as he flashes the cut at it and misses
back of a length outside off stump, he goes back and punches to covers
good length outside off stump, he goes back and pushes to cover
strives for the yorker, the slower one to, its not right where he wants it to and the batsman drives it to the off
back of a length outside off stump, he rocks back and punches to the off side
fraction wide and he slashes that past backward point for one out to third man
tossed up outside leg stump, he looks to flick but misses out, Murali appeals but that was outside the line of impact
fired in outside leg stump again, he looks to sweep but misses out
tossed up outside leg again, he looks to tickle it off the pads but misses
tossed up on leg stump, he sweeps and gets one to short fine leg
tossed up on the stumps again, Ashraful defends
pitches outside leg and rips into him, they appeal softly but that wasnt even close
good length outside off stump, Bashar leans into a good-looking coverdrive but an acrobatic Silva dives to his right and saves runs
bang, thats four! Short and wide, Bashar makes room and cuts hard between point and backward point and the ball races away for four
good length ball on off stump, he drives via the inside-edge to midwicket
strays down leg stump and its flicked away for one
back of a length, lifting delivery outside off stump, he shoulders arms
short and wide, he runs it down to third man for a single
tossed up from around the wicket again, Ashraful comes forward and taps it to the onside
tosses in another doosra, he comes forward and drives to point
quicker and fuller on off stump, Ashraful gets across and flicks into midwicket
lands outside leg stump and spins into him, not out as it was well outside the line of  impact
quicker through the air on off stump, he plants the pad forward and flicks across the line to square leg
quicker one again, outside leg stump, has him in trouble looking to flick
back of a length on middle and leg, he flicks past square leg out to the sweeper
moves in sharply from outside off stump, trapping him on the knee roll but it looked high, and umpire Harper shakes his head as Maharoof asks - nay, yells - the question
back of a length, he runs it down to third man for one
back of a length outside off stump, Ashraful stands and slashes at it, and the ball speeds over backward point out to third man
back of a length outside off stump, he gets behind it and defends
back of a length outside off stump, he shuffles across and defends to the off side
faster and fuller on off stump, he comes forward and flicks to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward in stoic defense
tossed up from over the wicket now, Ashraful gets forward and drives to cover
back to around, fires in a shorter, flatter one that Bashar tries to cut but cant
tossed up on leg stump, spins in sharply and they all go up for the leg before, but the umpire turns down their demand
tossed up outside leg stump, he looks to flick but mistimes it
back of a length outside off stump, not much carry on the slower ball as it beats the batsman
back of a length on the stump, he shuffles and taps it to midwicket
short and wide, sitting up, Ashraful stands there and fishes at it, and the resultant edge flies over slip and away for four, even though Vaas at third man tries his best to stop it
fuller one outside off stump, he jams the bat down in time and keeps it away on the off side
shot, son! Overpitched, Ashraful gets down and square-drives with authority past point for four, no stopping that!
back of a length outside off stump, this time he gets right behind the ball and defends back to Malinga
tossed up, he comes forward and squeezes it into the covers
close! Fired in on leg stump, he stands and tries to paddle it, misses, and the ball just misses leg stump
fired up on leg stump, he tucks it to the onside
tossed up again, he comes over it and flicks to midwicket
tossed up, he gets forward and gets done in by the flight, and ends up lofting it over the infield and down to long-off, where it lands safely before the fielder
tossed up, he goes back in defense
flat delivery on leg stump, he stands tall and drives to mid-on
tossed up on leg stump, turned straight to short fine leg

good fielding ! Tossed up on leg stump, Ashraful works it to short fine leg again, sets off for the single, Jayawardene swoops in and flips the ball back onto the stumps, a direct hit, and Bashar is gone!
tossed up on off stump, he drives to cover for one to get off the mark
tossed up, Ashraful gets over it and steers it to point
slower and flatter, he stands and drives off the back foot, in the air, towards mid-on
fired up on off stump, Ashraful gets back and defends
tossed up on leg stump, he tries the flick but misses, Sanga collects
tossed up outside off stump, he gets the leg forward and opens the face of the bat, scooping it over the infield for four, well done
tossed up on leg stump, he works it to the onside
tossed up again, he moves forward and runs it to point
flatter on and around off stump, he moves across and works it to midwicket, wants the run but Mortaza wisely sends him back
tossed up on off stump, Mortaza gets over it and kills the spin
tossed up again, and he defends neatly off the front foot
tossed up on off stump, this time he defends with an inside-edge around the corner
shorter and flatter, he stands up and punches back to Jayasuriya
tossed up on leg stump, worked to short fine leg
tossed up, forward defense
tossed up on off stump, flicked to midwicket
tossed up again, he slogs it into the deep but it lands safely in front of wide long-on
tossed up on off stump, Mortaza gets over it and defends
fired in quicker, Mortaza gets a full stretch forward and defends
fired in outside leg stump and it spins in like a leg break, Mortaza defends
quicker through the air, lands outside the line of impact, Mortaza gets a good stride forward yet they all go up in demand, but the umpire shakes his head
tossed up on off stump, Ashraful comes forward and flicks to square leg for one
slower one outside off stump, Mortaza leans forward and runs it to point
there she goes! Mortaza isnt sticking around for the defensive game, plants the leg forward and slams it over long-on for a big six!

yeah, he's not wasting time! Again he goes after one outside off stump, but the leading edge splices off the edge of the bat and goes up towards backward point, where Tharanga judges it well and takes in behind him as he runs back, no more biffs for Mortaza as Arnold gets a wicket
tossed up on off stump, no turn as Rafique comes forward and turns it fine
tossed up innocuously outside off stump, Rafique comes forward and defends
tossed up outside off stump, Ashraful gets to the pitch and drives down to long-off
tossed up from around the stumps, Rafique defends back to Dilshan
shorter and flatter, this time he goes back and punches to cover
tossed up outside off stump, Rafique defends and picks up a run as the ball rolls wide of point in the gap
tossed up, he comes forward and squeezes one to backward point
flatter one, too full, Rafique uses his feet and drives out to mid-off
tossed up quicker on off stump, Rafique lunges forward and defends
fraction flatter, this time he defends to point
tossed up, he comes forward and drives to point
tossed up on off stump, Rafique drives inside-out to cover
tossed up on off stump, Ashraful drives back down the ground, Arnold moves across and fields himself
flatter on middle and leg, worked into square and leg and he wants the single
short and spinning into him, he backs away and cuts into the covers
short and wide, now Rafique makes room and cuts out to the cover sweeper
tossed up, driven to mid-on
tossed up outside off stump, he lunges forward and defends to extra cover
flatter one outside off stump, Rafique goes onto the backfoot and punches to the bowler
flat on leg stump, eased to square leg for one
flat on off stump, Rafique defends to the onside, Arnold fields....yawn, the crowd has gone all numb
tossed up again, defended to the off side
quicker one on middle and off, he comes forward and flicks out to the deep midwicket sweeper
tossed up outside off stump, Ashraful drives to cover
tossed up and a fraction wide, Ashraful backs away, leaning low and square-drives backward of point for a lovely four...and someone in the crowd wakes up and blows a bugle in appreciation!
full and flat, Ashraful leans into it and drives through the covers for one
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and defends
tossed up, Ashraful gives himself room and drives that streakily over backward point for two to Maharoof in the deep, and some claps as the 100 comes up
tossed up as usual, this time he dances down the track and lofts it over mid-off down to long-off

short and a fraction wide of off stump, Rafique stands rooted and swings across the line, doesnt time it all and the ball soars up in the air and comes down near the deep midwicket ropes, Murali and Maharoof converge, Maharoof calls for it, Murali wants it, they both collide...looks like Murali really wants to take the catch...but in the end it settles in Maharoof's hands and neither fielder is injured..would've been ugly had they collided hard though
tossed up on middle and leg, punched to mid-on
tossed up, he comes forward and defends
starts off with one down leg, which is clipped for four runs down to fine leg
back of a length outside off stump, Ashraful pokes at it and gets a genuine french cut back leg stump for four more!
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and runs it to backward point
back of a length outside leg stump, Ashraful shuffles across to expose the stumps and the ball clips his pads, Sangakkara cant collect it and the ball runs fine for runs
edged and gone! Malinga lands one on a shortish length around off stump, ball rears and takes the outer edge of the bat through to Sangakkara! Malinga strikes for his third
lands on a good length just outside off stump, Rasel backs away and pokes at it and misses
tossed up outside off stump, Ashraful defends off the back foot
spins too far down leg stump and is called wide
tossed up outside off stump, he comes well forward and defends it away
spins in from outside off stump, tapped to the on side
tossed up, now he opts for the reverse-sweep but makes a mess of it
quicker and flatter, he tries to dab it fine but it goes to the fielder

all over! Tossed up on leg stump, Ashraful just drops it at his feet and calls Rasel for the run, a good throw comes in from Dilshan at midwicket and Sangakkara takes it on the first bounce and whips off the bails in one swift movement and Rasel is just short of the crease, despite the full stretch of the bat forward...
